about.title: Hi!
about.paragraph: Hello! I'm Atakan, a developer with a strong passion for technology and software development. My expertise lies in mobile app and web development. I'm constantly driven to learn new technologies and improve my projects.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.description: If you have any questions, project proposals, or collaboration ideas, feel free to reach out. I’ll get back to you as soon as possible.
